raw: * Attribute/Property handling for DOM HTML elements.
* Also includes support for HTML properties like checked
* or value. This feature set is supported cross-browser
* through one common interface and is independent of the differences between
* the multiple implementations.
* Supports applying text and HTML content using the attribute names
* text and html.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Attribute/Property handling for DOM HTML elements. Also includes support for HTML properties like checked or value. This feature set is supported cross-browser through one common interface and is independent of the differences between the multiple implementations. Supports applying text and HTML content using the attribute names text and html.

raw: * Internal map of attribute conversions
* Compiles an incoming attribute map to a string which
* could be used when building HTML blocks using innerHTML.
* This method silently ignores runtime attributes like
* html or text.
* @param map {Map} Map of attributes. The key is the name of the attribute.
* @return {String} Returns a compiled string ready for usage.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compiles an incoming attribute map to a string which could be used when building HTML blocks using innerHTML. This method silently ignores runtime attributes like html or text.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: map {Map} Map of attributes. The key is the name of the attribute.
@param.description: Map of attributes. The key is the name of the attribute.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} Returns a compiled string ready for usage.
@return.description: Returns a compiled string ready for usage.

raw: * Returns the value of the given HTML attribute
* @param element {Element} The DOM element to query
* @param name {String} Name of the attribute
* @return {var} The value of the attribute

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the value of the given HTML attribute

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} The DOM element to query

raw: * Sets an HTML attribute on the given DOM element
* @param element {Element} The DOM element to modify
* @param name {String} Name of the attribute
* @param value {var} New value of the attribute

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets an HTML attribute on the given DOM element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} The DOM element to modify

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} New value of the attribute

raw: * Serializes an HTML attribute into a writer; the `writer` function accepts
*  an varargs, which can be joined with an empty string or streamed.
* @param name {String} Name of the attribute
* @param value {var} New value of the attribute

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Serializes an HTML attribute into a writer; the writer function accepts an varargs, which can be joined with an empty string or streamed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} New value of the attribute
